__e: 'Cause you've been talking about thin ice, and that's a way of saying that someone is in trouble.
'I mean, it's fine and dandy being Queen, 'but, for all these years, all I've really wanted to do... 'is dance.
But all it takes is one second, one thin patch of ice, and your whole life changes forever.
And he was the finest man this family ever knew.
I think it's just the fourth glass of your fine wine that's finally gotten to him.
So that right there is a really fine animal you got.
